segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children near the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a wobbly-looking two-step stool, reaching for something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, it's a cookie jar, and he's definitely getting some cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches, almost like an acrobat, is quite impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, her hand outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a perfect little team of cookie bandits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; it's tilting precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised it hasn't completely tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet prize, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret operation is unfolding right behind the unsuspecting woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite clever of them to choose this opportune moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those fresh-baked cookies myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must be quite excited about their sugary treat.
segments.speaker: PAR
